description.value:
You can capably deliver toxins with a @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Blowgun]{Blowgun}. Your blowgun @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Strike]{Strikes} can apply injury poisons even if they deal no damage due to a creature's resistance.

If you critically succeed at an attack roll using a blowgun loaded with a dart you've poisoned and the target rolls a failure on the poison's initial save, the target critically fails instead.

rules.text: If you critically succeed at an attack roll with a dart you've poisoned, and the target rolls a failure on the poison's initial save, the target critically fails instead.
rules.title: {item|name}
